Articles.Content:
Hello and Help ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) plz ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

KSP is constantly crashing at ramdom times while playing,the only consant is it will crash. Havent been able to play for more then a half hour. sometimes crash comes quick or it will come 15 mins later.

did a clean install..no mods..still crashing

processor: intel core 2 duo 

 cpu e6750

Ram: 4.00 GB

System type: 64 bit

vid: GEFORCE GTS 450

drop box link to my crash output.log

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/fl2gimujzefhpl7/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fl2gimujzefhpl7/output_log.txt?dl=0)

I have 1500 hours into KSP..and I want more!

Thanks to any one who can help!

also have verified cache in steam. its ok

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T02:06:50Z" title="05/13/2015 02:06  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by GraviTykillz**
Press F10 every time you launch. Known issue. Possible patch tomorrow.

Bumpin

Still crashing with BSOD. 

Here is link to output\_log[https://www.dropbox.com/s/9pwwmdv0ddovfsf/output_log%20%282%29.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9pwwmdv0ddovfsf/output_log%20%282%29.txt?dl=0)
I can't see where you've specified the OS you're using. Can you provide your KSP.log (in root game directory)?
